phrases.pt: Preciso de arrumar a casa hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈsizu dɨ ɐʁuˈmaɾ ɐ ˈkazɐ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: I need to tidy the house today.

phrases.pt: Esqueci-me de comprar isso ontem.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɨʃkɨˈsimɨ dɨ kõˈpɾaɾ ˈisu ˈõtẽj

translations.text: I forgot to buy that yesterday.

phrases.pt: Temos de resolver isto em casa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ ʁɨzuɫˈveɾ ˈiʃtu ẽ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: We need to sort this out at home.

phrases.pt: A cozinha ficou uma confusão.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ kuˈziɲɐ fiˈkou ˈumɐ kõfuzˈɐ̃w

translations.text: The kitchen turned into a mess.

phrases.pt: Vou tratar disso mais tarde.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo tɾɐˈtaɾ ˈdisu ˈmajʃ ˈtaɾdɨ

translations.text: I’ll deal with that later.

phrases.pt: Falta-nos alguma coisa no frigorífico.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈfaɫtɐnuʃ ˈaɫɡumɐ ˈkojzɐ nu fɾiɡuˈɾifiku

translations.text: We’re missing something in the fridge.

phrases.pt: A casa está muito silenciosa hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈkazɐ ʃˈta ˈmũjtu silẽˈsjozɐ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: The house is very quiet today.

phrases.pt: Deixei isso em cima da mesa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: dɨjˈʃej ˈisu ẽ ˈsipɐ dɐ ˈmezɐ

translations.text: I left that on the table.

phrases.pt: Temos de falar sobre isto em casa.
phrases.ru: Нам нужно поговорить об этом дома.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ fɐˈlaɾ ˈsoβɾɨ ˈiʃtu ẽ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: We need to talk about this at home.

phrases.pt: Hoje não tenho energia para nada.
phrases.ru: Сегодня у меня нет сил ни на что.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ nɐ̃w ˈtẽɲu ẽnɨʁˈʒiɐ ˈpaɾɐ ˈnadɐ

translations.text: Today I have no energy for anything.

phrases.pt: Preciso de fazer uma limpeza geral.
phrases.ipa_transcription: pɾɨˈsizu dɨ fɐˈzeɾ ˈumɐ limpɨˈezɐ ʒɨˈɾaɫ

translations.text: I need to do a general cleaning.

phrases.pt: Ainda não lavei a loiça.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐˈĩdɐ nɐ̃w lɐˈvej ɐ ˈloj sɐ

translations.text: I still haven’t washed the dishes.

phrases.pt: A roupa ainda está a secar.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈʁopɐ ɐˈĩdɐ ʃˈta ɐ sɨˈkaɾ

translations.text: The clothes are still drying.

phrases.pt: Tenho de pôr a roupa a lavar.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽɲu dɨ poɾ ɐ ˈʁopɐ ɐ lɐˈvaɾ

translations.text: I need to put the laundry on.

phrases.pt: A casa precisa de uma boa arrumação.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈkazɐ pɾɨˈsizɐ dɨ ˈumɐ ˈboɐ ɐʁumɐˈsɐ̃w

translations.text: The house needs a good tidy-up.

phrases.pt: Vou preparar alguma coisa para comer.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo pɾɨpɐˈɾaɾ ˈaɫɡumɐ ˈkojzɐ ˈpaɾɐ kuˈmeɾ

translations.text: I’ll prepare something to eat.

phrases.pt: Não sei onde deixei as chaves.
phrases.ru: Я не знаю, куда положил(а) ключи.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ˈsej ˈõdɨ dɨjˈʃej ɐʃ ˈʃaβɨʃ

translations.text: I don’t know where I left the keys.

phrases.pt: Tenho de sair para fazer compras.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽɲu dɨ sɐˈiɾ ˈpaɾɐ fɐˈzeɾ ˈkõpɾɐʃ

translations.text: I need to go out shopping.

phrases.pt: Hoje ficamos em casa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ fiˈkɐmuʃ ẽ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: Today we’re staying at home.

phrases.pt: A casa está demasiado fria hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈkazɐ ʃˈta dɨmɐˈzjadu ˈfɾiɐ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: The house is too cold today.

phrases.pt: A casa está muito quente esta noite.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈkazɐ ʃˈta ˈmũjtu ˈkẽtɨ ˈeʃtɐ ˈnoj tɨ

translations.text: The house is very hot tonight.

phrases.pt: Tenho de chamar alguém para arranjar isto.
phrases.ru: Мне нужно вызвать кого-то, чтобы это починили.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽɲu dɨ ʃɐˈmaɾ ˈaɫɡẽj ˈpaɾɐ ɐʁɐ̃ˈʒaɾ ˈiʃtu

translations.text: I need to call someone to fix this.

phrases.pt: Isto avariou outra vez.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈiʃtu ɐβɐɾiˈou ˈotɾɐ ˈveʃ

translations.text: This broke down again.

phrases.pt: Temos de trocar esta lâmpada.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ tɾuˈkaɾ ˈeʃtɐ ˈlɐ̃pɐdɐ

translations.text: We need to change this light bulb.

phrases.pt: Vou abrir a janela um pouco.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo ɐˈbɾiɾ ɐ ʒɐˈnɛlɐ ˈũ ˈpoku

translations.text: I’ll open the window a bit.

phrases.pt: Esqueci-me de desligar a luz.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɨʃkɨˈsimɨ dɨ dɨʃliˈɡaɾ ɐ ˈluʃ

translations.text: I forgot to turn off the light.

phrases.pt: Tenho de tirar o lixo.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽɲu dɨ tiˈɾaɾ u ˈliʃu

translations.text: I need to take out the rubbish.

phrases.pt: Vamos jantar em casa hoje.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈvɐmuʃ ʒɐ̃ˈtaɾ ẽ ˈkazɐ ˈoʒɨ

translations.text: We’re having dinner at home today.

phrases.pt: A casa está cheia de coisas.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈkazɐ ʃˈta ˈʃejɐ dɨ ˈkojzɐʃ

translations.text: The house is full of stuff.

phrases.pt: Não encontro o comando da televisão.
phrases.ru: Я не могу найти пульт от телевизора.
phrases.ipa_transcription: nɐ̃w ĩˈkõtɾu u kõˈmɐ̃du dɐ tɨlɨβiˈzɐ̃w

translations.text: I can’t find the TV remote.

phrases.pt: Tenho de organizar melhor este espaço.
phrases.ru: Мне нужно лучше организовать это пространство.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽɲu dɨ oɾɡɐniˈzaɾ mɨˈʎɔɾ ˈeʃtɨ ɨʃˈpasu

translations.text: I need to organise this space better.

phrases.pt: A casa está um bocado desarrumada.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈkazɐ ʃˈta ˈũ bɐˈkadu dɨzɐʁuˈmadɐ

translations.text: The house is a bit messy.

phrases.pt: Vou descansar um pouco em casa.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo dɨʃkɐ̃ˈsaɾ ˈũ ˈpoku ẽ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: I’ll rest a bit at home.

phrases.pt: Hoje não me apetece sair de casa.
phrases.ru: Сегодня мне не хочется выходить из дома.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈoʒɨ nɐ̃w mɨ ɐpɨˈtesɨ sɐˈiɾ dɨ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: Today I don’t feel like leaving the house.

phrases.pt: Temos de fazer uma lista de compras.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ dɨ fɐˈzeɾ ˈumɐ ˈliʃtɐ dɨ ˈkõpɾɐʃ

translations.text: We need to make a shopping list.

phrases.pt: Vou pôr isto no sítio certo.
phrases.ru: Я положу это на своё место.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo poɾ ˈiʃtu nu ˈsitju ˈsɛɾtu

translations.text: I’ll put this in the right place.

phrases.pt: A casa parece mais calma agora.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ɐ ˈkazɐ pɐˈɾesɨ ˈmajʃ ˈkaɫmɐ ɐˈɡɔɾɐ

translations.text: The house feels calmer now.

phrases.pt: Temos visitas hoje à noite.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈtẽmuʃ viˈzitɐʃ ˈoʒɨ a ˈnoj tɨ

translations.text: We’re having guests tonight.

phrases.pt: Vou fechar a porta à chave.
phrases.ipa_transcription: vo fɨˈʃaɾ ɐ ˈpɔɾtɐ a ˈʃaβɨ

translations.text: I’ll lock the door.

phrases.pt: Acho que precisamos de mudar algumas coisas em casa.
phrases.ru: Думаю, нам нужно кое-что изменить дома.
phrases.ipa_transcription: ˈaʃu kɨ pɾɨsiˈzɐmuʃ dɨ muˈdaɾ ˈaɫɡumɐʃ ˈkojzɐʃ ẽ ˈkazɐ

translations.text: I think we need to change a few things at home.
